description:
Coronaviruses have been implicated in severe acute respiratory syndromes. The Ion AmpliSeqâ„¢ SARS-CoV-2 Research Panel is a quick, accurate and cost-effective tool to detect SARS-CoV-2 Virus responsible for Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). The panel contains 2 pools, containing a total of 247 amplicons (242 unique ones) to detect 237 viral specific SARS-CoV-2 targets and 5 human gene expression controls to assess presence of the virus in a variety of sample types (isolates, throat and nasal swabs) and will cover all potential serotypes to help better understand epidemiology outbreaks. To access the Quick Reference Guides for this panel follow the appropriate links for each instrument: 1) Ion GeneStudio S5 Series Systems, and 2) Ion Torrent Genexus System.

(Note: The instrument selection during ordering will be updated by September 17, 2020 to include the Genexus System. In the meantime, you may order the panel using the GeneStudio instrument option, even if the intent is to use it on the Genexus System.)

Design Date Feb 2020
Recommended Application Detection and epidemiology of Severe Acute respiratory Syndromes. Recommended Configuration Sample per Chip: 2-3 on 510 Chip, 4-6 on 520 Chip, 15-20 on 530 Chip, 60-80 on 540 Chip
Reads/sample: 1 Million 		Sample Type Viral/human mixture of cDNA
Number of sample in publication N/A Observed Performance Panel uniformity: >90%
Reads on-targets: >99%
 Input RNA required 5-10ng cDNA per sample
Disease Research Area: Infectious Disease

genome_reference._comment: Genome Reference information for import into Torrent Server 4.4+
genome_reference.name: Ion Ampliseq SARS-CoV-2 Reference
